name: disco #1
description: Awwwwe. The hedonistic days of my youth. Mirrored balls and pulsating beats. These patterns bring back memories.......and being that there is an original design on both sides of this pillow...... It's like getting 2 pillows in 1. All pillows are 22" x 22" and come with a Hypoallergenic insert and are machine washable for easy care.

name: Shibori #1
description: The Japanese art of tying knots on fabric and then dying it has always fascinated me. These designs have a very organic feeling to me.......and being that there is an original design on both sides of this pillow...... It's like getting 2 pillows in 1. All pillows are 22" x 22" and come with a Hypoallergenic insert and are machine washable for easy care.

It's like getting 2 pillows in 1. All pillows are 22" x 22" and come with a Hypoallergenic insert and are machine washable for easy care.

name: new deco #1

I decided to design a group that "Tip's My Hat" to this most beloved of styles.......and being that there is an original design on both sides of this pillow...... It's like getting 2 pillows in 1. All pillows are 22" x 22" and come with a Hypoallergenic insert and are machine washable for easy care.

name: flame #1
description: I wanted to do a group of designs that were inspired by the flame patterns in Bargello Quilts. I just love the way the colors react off each other. name: shells #1
description: For me there has always been something magical about sea shells. It's seems like there is an infinite amount of sizes and shapes that these creatures come in. It's like getting 2 pillows in 1. All pillows are 22" x 22" and come with a Hypoallergenic insert and are machine washable for easy care.

It's like getting 2 pillows in 1. All pillows are 22" x 22" and come with a Hypoallergenic insert and are machine washable for easy care.

name: birds #1
description: I've always loved the look of antique bird illustrations. The images in this group particularly speak to me. It feels very "Cape Cod" and being that there is an original design on both sides...... It's like getting 2 pillows in 1. All pillows are 22" x 22" and come with a Hypoallergenic insert and are machine washable for easy care.
